attributes.action: ensure that the leadership of the labour party is not just handed to Gordon Brown
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this man is not fit for purpose. Under this government (run by Tony Blair and Gordon Brown) we have seen the loss of the "great" from Great Britain and we are fast becoming a third world nation. If Brown were to be given the leadership without a true contest, this country would really fail.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
